objective: Add baseline security and operational hardening required for release-candidate readiness.
scope_in: Input size and request timeout limits on gateway endpoints
Dependency and image vulnerability scanning in CI
Structured logging and correlation IDs across gateway/orchestrator
Basic health and readiness checks for all services
Performance thresholds for turn latency and patch apply time
implementation_checklist: Define and enforce API payload limits and rate guardrails
Add security scanning commands to CI workflows
Standardize log format and correlation fields
Define baseline perf thresholds and fail CI on violations
acceptance_criteria: CI fails on critical security findings or threshold regressions
Runtime logs support tracing a request across services
Operational checks detect unavailable dependencies quickly
risks: False positives from security tooling block release
Mitigation: maintain allowlist process with explicit expiry and owner
